extendedInfo.description: D Sharp Mobile Diabetes Management is a cross-device, cross-platform web-based app for managing any type of diabetes. Track and visualize your BGs, insulin, blood pressure, weight and more to spot trends and make adjustments to your care.Logbook* Enter all your medications and activities with a single entry* Record oral diabetes medications, insulin and basal and bolus delivery for pump users* Record other medications and vitamins* Calculate insulin dose for bolus delivery with an active insulin calculator* Customize the interface for your type of diabetes care* Record duration, intensity and type of exercise* Track weight in pounds or kilograms* Track blood pressure* Make notes to explain BG readings or activitiesTools & Calculators* The Insulin Calculator uses your type of insulin, weight, insulin sensitivity, carb to insulin ratio and active insulin to calculate your bolus delivery* The Estimated A1C uses four different methods to give you the most accurate estimated A1C* A Personalized Dashboard for at-a-glance entries and trends in the last 48 hours allows you to include any of the following features:    * Daily blood glucose average    * BG graph for last 48 hours    * Number of high, low and in-range BGs    * Total insulin used    * Time since last BG check    * Average BG    * Active insulin    * Total carbs    * Last blood pressure reading and time taken    * Last dose of each medication and time taken* SMS Reminders sent to your smartphone or feature phone if more than four waking hours have passed since your last observationReports, Graphs & Charts* Visualize your estimated A1C and long-term trends* View fluctuations in your weight over time* Blood Pressure readings displayed in an easy-to-view graph* Mealtime Trend Report breaks down mealtime readings to see the * percentage of in-range, high and low BGs in a colourful scale chart* Blood Glucose By Hour colour codes each day and layers one on top of another to easily spot BG patterns throughout the day* See total insulin use by day and type with our stacked bar graph* Identify days or times of high-carb consumption with the Daily Carb Counter graph* See a graph of all your recent blood glucose readings at a glance in your D Sharp Dashboard* Export detailed charts and tables to share with your doctor, dietitian, diabetes educator or caregiverShare Data & Get Results* Get weekly emails with progress reports, tips and articles for better diabetes management* Print or email reports to your doctor for analysis and changes in care* Access your logbook, analysis and reports from any networked device* Share your account with a family member, friend or caregiver to help manage your diabetesCross Device* D Sharp works across all popular smartphones, tablets, including networked e-readers and desktops* Unlike traditional device-specific or native apps, D Sharp was written to provide the same product across multiple platforms and devices* One fee gives you access to unlimited devices. Itâs not necessary to purchase twice for your smartphone and tablet* Log in from your device of choice through a browser or add an icon to your home screen for easy access* D Sharp is hosted in the cloud to provide the power needed to generate graphs, charts and analysis. Itâs not necessary to sync to your mobile device for these featuresEasy To Use* Personalize the D Sharp interface to ensure each log is quick and applicable to your unique care* Enter all your medications and activities with a single entry* High-contrast colours and bold fonts for easy reading* Data is stored in the cloud, which means there isnât any uploading or syncing devices. Simply log in from whichever device you, your family member or caregiver uses to view and make entries.For more information, check out http://dsharpdiabetes.com

reviews.title: Basil
reviews.comment: Need to be able to print basil insulin the same as active. Other than that this is an awesome tool.
reviews.author: Richard Norton

reviews.title: Web based record keeping
reviews.comment: Type 1, basal and bolus shots.  Lets me track at home on the Kindle Fire and at work (or on the go) on the web.  Gives weekly reports. After a few weeks I started to spot trends in my BG readings vs time of day. If I forget to measure (or enter a measurement) I get a text message reminding me.  That can be turned off, but I like it at the moment.  This doesn\'t do diet calculations, so you still need to work out how many carbs and protein that steak and salad amount to and then work up your bolus manually.  I hope to see something like the USDA food database integrated in a future release.  Nothing out there is perfect, but this is easy to use and that alone is a powerful incentive to tracking BG better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.comment: Amazing job for a first release. Far better than anything else out there, and I get the impression that it will only get better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but too unreliable
reviews.comment: This is one of the best designed diabetes apps and is very clever in how it looks and works the same on all devices. However twice in the last week I have received 404 errors when trying to access the app...this is not acceptable for something which is meant to help monitor diabetes. Have abandoned this and will be trying debees instead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Probably useful but it runs impossibly slow on my s3. I want something i can enter my data in quickly
reviews.author: Meghan Arnold

reviews.title: Too slow
reviews.comment: 30 seconds for any screen to come up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app but...
reviews.comment: This application is slower than its web page, and adds no more functionality. Give me a native UI and some alarm/remainder functions and I\'ll be content.   For now I\'ll do myself a favour and replace this application by a bookmark to the web page.
reviews.author: Per Modin

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I have used D sharpe for a year and have spotted trends with the app.  It is very good and the calculation of insulin is nice. I use fitness pal to calculate carbs and paired with D sharpe have given me the tools i need to control my blood sugar level.
reviews.author: Cindy Coates

reviews.title: Great cross platform app
reviews.comment: I love that I can enter data using my android while out, or use my desktop at work. Has all the features I need.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No offline data entry
reviews.comment: My work and personal activities take me many places where i dont have internet access so this is essentially useless since there is no offline mode. I also found it too complicated for my needs.
reviews.author: Christian Forisek

reviews.title: Free app, but oh by the way we are going to need ...
reviews.comment: Loaded the free app, but before I can use it they sent me to a website that needs some \"base information\" in order to sign up.  Read the privacy privacy and got concerned about their selling aggregate anonymous information to third parties and oh by the way, we will require you to allow us to send you spam and we will need you to update your information  periodically to get continued access.  I hear this is a good app, occasionally slow, but I\'m not ok with the \"extras.\"  No thanks.
reviews.author: Brian Smith

reviews.comment: Says its free and then makes you sign up for a 14 day free trial.
reviews.author: A Google User
